component.name: KCamera Controls
component.summary: Camera controls pipeline for KDE Plasma

description.p: A camera controls pipeline application for KDE Plasma on Linux, providing a system tray interface for managing camera settings and effects.

ul.li: System Tray Integration: Lives in the KDE Plasma system tray
Camera Pipeline: Configure and manage camera effects pipeline
Effects Support: Add, remove, and reorder camera effects
Camera Controls: Adjust lighting, zoom, exposure, and other camera settings
KDE Native: Designed to feel native to the KDE Plasma environment
